name: nforwardauth
tagline: An authentication proxy for protecting internal applications
description: nForwardAuth is a self-hosted identity provider and authentication proxy that centralizes login through OAuth2 with routing rules and session forwarding. Designed for protecting internal apps.

features.title: Oauth2 Authentication
features.description: Centralize login using OAuth2 providers like Google, GitHub, or custom IdPs

features.title: Forward Auth Proxy
features.description: Protect internal applications by intercepting requests and validating sessions

features.title: Session Management
features.description: Handle user sessions with secure cookies and token validation

features.title: Access Control
features.description: Restrict application access based on user groups, roles, or email domains

features.title: Logout Handling
features.description: Centralized logout that clears sessions across all protected applications
